Portfolio: a group of your accomplishments and works to show people. I love designing things, I love learning, I love beer. The following pages are about beers I’ve had, I’ll write a review of the beer, and then design a web page around it. I’ve been exploring craft beer for over a decade and graphic design/web design for just about as long. This isn’t just a portfolio this is a passion project. I think that’s better than a portfolio.
